name: Coordinated Management of Rate, Power and Carrier Sense Threshold for IEEE 802.11 Networks
tagline: NS3 Network Simulator with power control of WiFi transmissions. Implementation of different proposed mechanisms for joint power and rate control.
body:
This project contains the implementations of three different power and rate control algorithms: PARF[1], APARF[2] and Minstrel-Piano[3] for the NS3 simulator.
There is also included tests where this algorithms can be compared in different scenarios.
